note.requirements: Minimum 5 contacts this month (2 face-to-face, 3 collateral).
note.additionalNotes: Angela continues to demonstrate improved housing stability and engagement with peer support services. Financial stability remains dependent on SSDI decision.

direct: Contact 1 — Date: July 1, 2025 | Type: Face-to-face | Duration: 30 min | Location: Doxy | Summary: Discussed progress across housing, financial, and mental health domains. Angela expressed relief after housing repairs and anxiety around pending SSDI. | Progress: Housing repairs complete; utilizing food bank resources; connected to peer support and completed MH advance directive. | Next Steps: Monitor housing stability, prepare for SSDI decision, expand community connections, assess readiness for transition.

Contact 2 — Date: July 15, 2025 | Type: Face-to-face | Duration: 25 min | Location: Doxy | Summary: Reviewed ongoing progress, anxiety remains focused on SSDI decision. Reports improved sleep and continued peer support participation. | Progress: Housing stable, financial status pending SSDI, mental health supported via peer services. | Next Steps: Await SSDI decision, continue peer support, explore additional resources, plan for transition.
collateral: Collateral 1 — Date: July 8, 2025 | Kentucky Community Mental Health Center | Type: Phone (10 min) | Summary: Confirmed Angela's participation in peer support services; noted consistent attendance aligning with MH goals.
Collateral 2 — Date: July 22, 2025 | Local Food Bank | Type: Email (8 min) | Summary: Confirmed regular utilization of food bank resources supporting financial stability while awaiting SSDI.
Collateral 3 — Date: July 29, 2025 | Housing Assistance Program | Type: Phone (15 min) | Summary: Verified housing repairs completed and no new issues reported; supports housing stability goal.

nextSteps: Continue monitoring housing stability and maintenance needs.
Assist Angela in preparing for SSDI determination outcomes.
Maintain peer support involvement and explore additional COD-focused groups.
Assess readiness for service transition contingent on benefits outcomes.
